Last time on Jojo's Bizarre Adventure...
Avdol, I forgot to tell you earlier,
but do not touch anything that looks like an electrical outlet.
I am afraid I have touched it, Mr. Joestar.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I cannot believe my body's become a magnet, too!
We cannot help that her power's taken hold of us.
Just think about fighting and defeating her Stand!
Anyway, we cannot stay here like this forever.
N-Now, let us try to separate ourselves.
that must mean twice the magnetic force is affecting us.
Let us go to that fence, grab hold, and pull apart.
M-Mr. Joestar... Th-This is very embarrassing.
We are just practicing a dance.
Y-Yes, dancing outside is truly the best!
We made it this far without tripping.
Avdol, do you think you can slowly slide off of me?
I will hold on to this fence.
Try to slide down my body, and move away from my toes.
Since our heads are sticking together,
our heads and feet must have opposite polarities,
Does not this look very risque?
If anyone saw us, they might get the wrong idea...
I said go away, you damn brats!
That is easier said than done...
This is not the role I have taken!
Mr. Joestar, if you move like that...
I-It is the old lady from the hotel!
I thought you were a wonderful gentleman,
but to think you are into this sort of filth!
How dare you play with a woman's heart?!
We need to stay apart, Avdol!
Your magnetism is growing stronger and stronger.
She is got some nerve, just sitting there and smoking.
Avdol, approach her from that side.
Do not let her get away this time.
She seems like a strong woman.
She may have laid a trap for us.
It seems we have already fallen into her trap!
Avdol, use Magician's Red's flames to slice the rails!
We need to get away now!
Hurry up and slice the rails!
If I were to slice these rails...
The train would derail, causing a huge accident and killing many people!
Even if I tried to grab her with my vines, she is out of my Stand's range.
But I can try using that post to pull us free...
Now to kill Jotaro and Polnareff!
You burned through the railroad ties and dug a hole!
This suits the image of Mohammed Avdol!
This is the role my character plays!
I regret that I am now going to strangle you enough
to put you in the hospital for a week.
Your magnetism is rather troublesome, you know.
My chest did not get bigger...
This is what I had in my pockets.
The weapons I had in my pockets!
Your magnetic force will keep growing stronger...
She is keeping a certain distance between us.
I am sure that woman fights by staying neither too close nor too far.
If she gets too close to us, she will be caught.
If she goes too far, the magnetism stops working.
This magnetism is the work of a Stand, so it follows the rules of Stands.
Once the user is too far away, its power weakens!
She said the magnetism would keep getting stronger.
Shall we flee until the magnetic force expires?
Even if we were able to escape this magnetism,
it will not mean we defeated the Stand.
have strategically retreated from fights in my younger days,
but I have never once abandoned a fight.
I am going to keep fighting with all my might!
This is a map of the city.
If she continues down this road, she will loop around and head back this way.
I will not think of her as a woman anymore.
I will get her, no matter what!
People from the city have arrived.
I am sure they will report the damage before the next train comes.
Seems like something is going on.
They have stopped running for now.
That is a pretty crappy thing to do.
I think people like that will get what they deserve.
I spent three months' pay on this.
They are chasing as fast as they can...
B-But they will never catch me.
Looks like you can barely move now.
You will not be able to chase me anymore.
I know these roads better than you do.
Now, at the last moment, the tables have turned!
You still do not get it.
You think you have cornered me, but it is you two who are cornered.
You will burn to a crisp!
Avdol can defend himself with his flames, just barely,
but you have no chance, Joestar.
My Bast's power is far greater
Woman, my flames will roast you!
I control flames that can melt steel,
but I cannot defend myself from this...
Joseph Joestar, since this is the end, I will tell you...
We have only known each other for a few minutes,
but you are witty and canny,
and your experience gives you the good judgment that young people lack.
You have got very charming looks, too.
Our ages are quite far apart, but I might not have minded being with you.
Would you mind saving me, then?
You are a lot more powerful than my Hermit Purple!
I cannot hold on much longer... P-Please.
Nah, I do not think so.
You are nowhere near as charming as Lord Dio.
I-Is there nothing that will convince you to stop the magnetism?
Sorry, but you have to die.
Even though I am begging you?
You are much too persistent, you fool.
Then you have lost, young lady.
We told you this was a pincer attack!
Magnets are attracted to each other.
Once you were between us, your luck ran out.
She cannot hear you, Mr. Joestar.
It looks like she is passed out.
She is been crushed by the weight and magnetic force.
I am sure she is broken more than a few bones.
Shall we go get some breakfast?
I am rather hungry after all that running around.
All bones broken, admitted to hos
All bones broken, admitted to hospital.
What the hell are they doing?
They are taking longer than a woman getting dressed.
They might have encountered an enemy.
Maybe we should go look for them.
Mariah is fighting with Joestar and Avdol.
I, Alessi, shall kill Jotaro and Polnareff.
Come with me to the bathroom and take off your clothes.
I will help you take them off.
